716000.name: Space Dragon
716000.description:
Have you ever wanted to destroy a world? How about a dozen?

Take control of a pair of hatchling space dragons and blast your way through the cosmos with our innovative move-and-warp system. Fight the robotic armadas that have enslaved the massive beasts of the galaxy! Destroy suns, battle epic bosses, and leap to new systems through mind-bending wormholes!

The Universal Update brings the new, improved, and dramatically expanded content from the Unchained and Dragon Bytes Quest releases to Steam!

Here are just a few of the things we’ve introduced:
- A major overall performance boost and visual updates!
- New weapons for the AI enemies, including guided missiles, tracking lasers, and more!
- New level events and points of interest!
- More bullet hell. MORE!
- Updated boss fights!
- Additional level content leading up to the bosses!
- New story content added! Intercept transmissions throughout the game to learn more about the AI’s goals and background.
- Localization added for French, Spanish, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, and Traditional Chinese added.

Thank you all for your continued support!
716000.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 韩语, 简体中文, 繁体中文
